name: Chitinous shell
description: A hard shell harvested from insectoid monsters, prized by craftsmen for its durability.
additionalInfo: Often obtained from creatures like endregas or arachasae. Used as a crafting component in armors, providing extra resilience.

name: Copper ore
description: A lump of raw copper ore used as a base material in forging lesser metals.
additionalInfo: Sourced from mines or purchased from merchants. Often smelted into copper ingots for crafting lower-tier weapons and armor.

name: Cured draconid leather
description: Leather treated from draconid hides, known for its exceptional strength.
additionalInfo: Crafted from draconid hides after proper curing. Highly valued in the production of superior witcher gear.

name: Cured leather
description: Leather that has undergone a curing process to increase its durability.
additionalInfo: A staple material for crafting various types of armor and straps. Easily obtained and widely used.

name: Dark steel ingot
description: A hardened ingot forged from rare steel alloys, known for its remarkable hardness.
additionalInfo: Used to craft advanced weapons and armor, including witcher gear upgrades.

name: Dark steel plate
description: A plate forged from dark steel offering exceptional structural integrity.
additionalInfo: Employed in high-quality armor and blade crafting, prized by master blacksmiths.

name: Dimeritium ore
description: A rare ore that disrupts magic, highly prized in anti-magical equipment.
additionalInfo: Refined into dimeritium ingots or plates, essential for crafting gear resistant to magical effects.

name: Enriched dimeritium ore
description: A refined form of dimeritium ore with even greater anti-magical properties.
additionalInfo: Key for forging top-tier witcher gear offering heightened resistance to spells.

name: Fifth essence
description: A mysterious alchemical substance enhancing advanced crafting processes.
additionalInfo: Used in complex alchemical formulas and in forging special gear with unique properties.

name: Glowing ore
description: An ore that emits a faint luminescence, used in special forging recipes.
additionalInfo: Sought by master craftsmen to create unique, high-quality items and rare upgrades.

name: Glowing ore ingot
description: An ingot smelted from glowing ore, retaining its gentle radiance.
additionalInfo: Refined for forging exceptional gear, sometimes with subtle magical affinities.

name: Gold ore
description: A valuable ore refined into gold ingots for jewelry and special gear.
additionalInfo: Highly prized by merchants. Used to craft ornate weapons, armor accents, and certain alchemical items.

name: Hardened leather
description: Leather chemically treated to greatly increase its toughness and resilience.
additionalInfo: Favored in making advanced armor components, providing better defense than standard cured leather.

name: Infused dust
description: A fine dust imbued with magical or elemental energies.
additionalInfo: Crucial for crafting glyphs, runestones, and enchanting gear with magical enhancements.

name: Leather scraps
description: Small pieces of leftover leather, reused for minor crafting needs.
additionalInfo: Used to produce straps, bindings, or to patch up armor and clothes.

name: Leather straps
description: Sturdy leather strips for binding and reinforcing equipment.
additionalInfo: Essential for crafting handles, belts, and fittings in armor and weapons.

name: Meteorite silver ingot
description: A rare silver ingot enriched with meteorite minerals, enhancing monster-slaying properties.
additionalInfo: Used to forge superior silver swords, granting enhanced effectiveness against monsters.

name: Monster egg
description: An egg harvested from monstrous nests, valuable in alchemy.
additionalInfo: Sourced from harpy or arachas nests. Crucial for crafting certain alchemical concoctions.

name: Orichalcum ore
description: A rare and exotic ore known for its unique hue and magical potential.
additionalInfo: Used in forging relic-grade items and high-end gear of exceptional quality.

name: Silver ingot
description: A refined ingot of silver, key to forging effective monster-slaying weapons.
additionalInfo: Widely used in crafting silver swords and other anti-monster gear.

name: Silver plate
description: A flattened piece of pure silver used to reinforce weapons and armor.
additionalInfo: Employed in advanced crafting recipes, especially those requiring extra monster-killing potency.

name: Steel ingot
description: A standard steel ingot, the backbone of many weapons and armor.
additionalInfo: A common yet vital component, forming the basis of numerous upgrades and gear.

name: String
description: A thin cord used to bind components and reinforce light gear.
additionalInfo: Commonly used in crafting bowstrings, sewing lighter armor, and creating accessories.

name: Thread
description: Fine thread used for stitching fabrics, clothes, and lightweight armors.
additionalInfo: Essential for tailors and armorsmiths when assembling complex garments and quilted armor.

name: Dwarven spirit
description: A strong dwarven liquor used as an alchemical base.
additionalInfo: Crucial in potion brewing, providing a stable base for many witcher decoctions.

name: Celandine
description: A yellow-flowered herb used in various healing and alchemical recipes.
additionalInfo: Harvested from fields and forests. A key ingredient in potions enhancing vitality.

name: Drowner brain
description: The brain of a drowned undead creature, valuable in alchemy.
additionalInfo: Collected from drowned monsters in marshes and rivers. Used in potions and oils.

name: Ribleaf
description: A common herb known for its fibrous leaves and mild medicinal properties.
additionalInfo: Easily gathered in fields. Serves as a base ingredient in simpler alchemical mixtures.

name: Ghoul's blood
description: Thick, dark blood harvested from ghouls.
additionalInfo: Sought for more potent alchemical concoctions. Gathered from ghouls roaming graveyards and battlefields.

name: Moon dustbombs
description: Bombs containing powdered moonstone, effective against shapeshifting monsters.
additionalInfo: Used to prevent transformations and weaken creatures like vampires and werewolves.

name: Vampire oils
description: Specialized blade oils increasing damage against vampires.
additionalInfo: Applied to swords to exploit vampire vulnerabilities, greatly enhancing combat effectiveness.

name: Black bloodpotions
description: Potions causing blood-drinking monsters to be harmed when feeding on the imbiber.
additionalInfo: A key tool against necrophages and vampires, turning their feeding habits against them.

name: Yrden
description: A component associated with the Yrden sign, likely used for sign-related enhancements.
additionalInfo: Employed in glyph or runestone crafting to improve Yrden sign intensity or effects.

name: Grapeshot bombs
description: Bombs filled with shrapnel, inflicting widespread damage upon detonation.
additionalInfo: Effective against clusters of enemies. Often combined with oils to maximize damage.

name: Hybrid oil
description: A blade oil that enhances damage against hybrid creatures.
additionalInfo: Applied to weapons to counter harpies, sirens, and other hybrid monsters.

name: Thunderbolt potions
description: Potions increasing a witcher's attack power, aiding in tougher fights.
additionalInfo: A fundamental combat enhancer. Enhanced and superior versions offer even greater boosts.

name: Aard
description: A sign-related component linked to the Aard sign, used in magical enhancements.
additionalInfo: Incorporated in crafting glyphs that strengthen the telekinetic force of the Aard sign.

name: Kaer Morhen
description: A component referencing the witchers’ fortress, symbolizing foundational witcher craft.

name: Skellige
description: A component symbolizing the Skellige Isles, known for rugged landscapes and distinct flora.

name: Novigrad
description: A component referencing the free city of Novigrad, hub of commerce and craft.
